reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it's not tight around the neck, and appreciate its flattering design that hugs curves perfectly. The fabric is thick and nice, with good stretch, and one customer mentions it's stretchy enough to hug the body. While some it's true to size, others report sizing issues. The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding the sleeves perfect while others say they're too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT Dress - Made my menopausal self feel pretty again! ðŸ˜
items.body: If you are going through perimenopause or are in menopause, then you will know how it goes: one day you are OK with your body, everything fits the way you want it to fit and then the next day even if you don't gain weight, everything moves to a different place - or like in my case - you not only gain an extra 20 pounds but you also have the weight moved to places that you do not appreciate! My weight seems to have accumulated in my stomach and thighs. I am not overweight, but I somehow have little "rolls" around my middleðŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸. Ladies in Peri and moving towards peri - IYKYK. This dress makes me feel pretty again. The weight of the material is excellent. It is not too thin and not too heavy. This dress has great flexibility because you can wear it with tall boots, heels, and even dressy flats. I also saw a few reviews with women wearing heeled booties. I liked it and I'm about to try it on with booties right now. It truly is a multifunctional dress. I bought it to wear to Valentine's dinner and a business event. I bought it in black thinking that it would hide my "pooch" a little easier than the red. But- now that I have the black and have seen the quality of the material and how it lays, I am already putting the red one in my cartðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜. Valentine's Day weekend will be a little chilly, but I think I will be just fine because of the weight of the material and the long sleeves. The little flare on the end of the sleeves is what makes the dress so adorable for those of you with longer or shorter arms, I think mine are pretty average and length and the end of the sleep goes mid palm on my hand when I hold out my arms. I was also unsure what size to get because some people were getting a medium and they were my size and some were getting a large also close to my size. In the end, I went with a large due to my bust size and not liking to have dresses be tight under my armpits. That drives me crazy. The large fits perfectly. It is not too tight, but still hugs all the right places. I am 5'6, 150lb, 36DD, 30" waist if this helps anyone. Read more
items.author: Krissy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loveeeeeee this dress .
items.body: True to size .. sleeves are long and material is so perfect ..very high qualityThis black holiday dress is a classic and versatile choice for any festive occasion. The fabric feels luxurious yet comfortable, with just the right amount of stretch to ensure ease of movement throughout the evening. The is flattering on women with wide hips -featuring a tailored fit that cinches at the waist and flows elegantly down, offering a sophisticated yet relaxed feel. The design is timeless with a touch of modern flaired sleeve . The black color ensures it can be dressed up or down, making it perfect for everything from a cozy family dinner to a more formal gala. What I love most is its ability to pair easily with simple accessories making it a perfect canvas for personal style. It also doesnâ€™t wrinkle easily, which is a big bonus for long nights of celebration. Overall, this black holiday dress is an essential addition to any wardrobe, especially for those looking for an elegant, timeless piece that works well across different holiday events. Read more

items.body: This has to be the worst clothing purchase experience Iâ€™ve ever had with Amazon. First of all, it came in generic packaging not even noting what size no tags no labels no nothing and it smelled like formaldehyde. I couldnâ€™t even get my arm in the sleeve if that tells you anything! I suppose this company is extremely inconsistent because there are good reviews but as you can see in the picture, I received ball of unidentifiable, wrinkled fabric!oh and did I mention the zipper wonâ€™t even operate! Iâ€™m done Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update. Even better!
items.body: This dress is fabulous! The princess seaming and darts are utterly flattering. The fabric is great. Thick and 4 way stretch. Itâ€™s a mini but covers the booty then a good 6â€ the Perfect Length. Note: the fit is body-conn without being slutty. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ narrow hipsâ€¦. torso seams are flattering but if you are a little â€œthickâ€ in the waist like me, may want to size up. Love the fitted sleeves and bell cuffs. Good length. SLIGHTLY SMALL SO EXCHANGED FOR LARGER SIZE. GOOD FIT! The SLEEVES/cuffs run a tad long FYI. Overall a great party dress! Oh, and the red is a gorgeous Christmas red color. Read more
items.author: Stecky

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, White, Beige, Purple, Peacock Blue, Rose, Black, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
